keyPolicies.policyTitle: A STRONG ECONOMY AND LOCAL JOBS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Since my election in 2010, unemployment has fallen by 50% and we have seen 865 more businesses set up in Northampton North. I have always supported local jobs and I will continue to do so.

The Government has pledged to recruit another 20,000 police nationally, including many more here in Northamptonshire. I will support coordinated, local solutions to tackle both crime and the causes of crime - including anti-social behaviour.

I have helped to secure up to Â£25 million for Northampton from the Government's new Towns Fund. This money will bring exciting opportunities for our town centre, and I will continue to fight for even more!
